page.title: 16Kings Cinema Sold
page.content: The Kings Cinema in Brechin High Street has been bought by two young Brechin Businessmen who are expanding their Interests. Mr Stuart Aitkenhead and Mr Michael Swilinski who already own the Angus Steakhouse, the Nova Lounge and the East End Bar,take over on June 14. They will continue to operate the premises as a Cinema and Bingo Hall with attached Launderette Considerable improvements are planned.Fears,both public and private that Angus would lose one of its few remaining Cinemas have therefore been squashed.
